title: Don't use cosine similarity carelessly - Piotr Migdał
excerpt: Cosine similarity - the duct tape of AI. Convenient but often misused. Let's find out how to use it better.

title: Cosine Similarity
excerpt: Cosine similarity can measure the proximity between two documents by transforming words into vectors within a vector space.

title: eBay’s Blazingly Fast Billion-Scale Vector Similarity Engine
excerpt: The Similarity Engine's use cases include item-to-item similarity for text and image modality and user-to-item personalized recommendations based on a user’s historical behavior data.
